site_name: Wellington Barracks Birdcage WalkLondonSW1E 6HQ
description: WELL 0030	Platanus spp (plane)	Crown clean by removing deadwood wind-damage and branch failure stubs throughout canopyWELL 0031	Platanus spp (plane)	Crown clean by removing deadwood wind-damage and branch failure stubs throughout canopyWELL 0033	Platanus spp (plane)	Clear structure by removing laterals and/or sub-laterals to ensure a minimum 2.0m clearanceWELL 0035	Platanus spp (plane)	Crown clean by removing deadwood wind-damage and branch failure stubs throughout canopy, Clear structure by removing laterals and/or sub-laterals to ensure a minimum 2.0m clearanceWELL 0049	Platanus spp (plane)	Remove hanger and/or fractured limb/s to appropriate pruning pointWELL 0059	Betula spp (birch) 	Remove stem/s close to ground level and treat stump to prevent re-growth, Grind stump to 150mm including chasing of surface roots and re-instate as per surrounding areaWELL 0060	Fraxinus spp (ash)		Remove stem/s close to ground level and treat stump to prevent re-growth, Grind stump to 150mm including chasing of surface roots and re-instate as per surrounding areaCPT-03	Group of Prunus, holly, thorn, hazel: prune to clear structure by 1m by removing laterals and / or sub-laterals to appropriate growth pointsCPT-06	Group of ash , robinia, beech, sycamore, lime, prunes, rhododendron, laurel.Remove root suckers and/or epicormic growth up to 2.0m for all lime tree on boundary fenceCPT-07	Group of willow, holly, laurel, Prunus: prune to clear structure by 1m by removing laterals and / or sub-laterals to appropriate growth points, and reduce height back to form hedge
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
